english.segment1: When your life turns upside down. and it will some day. where is your proprioceptive sense?
english.segment2: Like the feline that finds the floor on all fours. is the house built on rock that the devil abhors. build your house on sand to find. a cat with one life instead of nine
english.segment3: Proprioception. balance correction. innate sense gives direction
english.segment4: Break your fall with daggers. as your focus staggers - the line knives syndrome
english.segment5: Ghinger, Abyssinian, Tsukahara, Skaukatt, Yurchenko, Korat
english.segment6: To "see" with that sixth sense. when there's no sign of the other five. 3 inward pike - the sense that keeps the diver alive
english.segment7: Proprioception. balance correction. innate sense gives direction.
